name: Bike Stunts Race Game 3D
description:
Do you like dinosaurs? And you want to play with them?
Do you love motocross and you want to chase these giant prehistoric creatures?
They will chase you again and try to eat you!
Remember to screw the throttle quickly your dirt bike!
Brmmm....

Great! Download this game and enjoy the feeling of reliving the Jurassic era with breathtaking driving bike stunts levels:
- Dozens of unlockable levels
- Many impressive characters and bunker trials extreme bikes
- And of course, dinosaurs! Lots of dinosaurs!
All kinds of crawling, flying, swimming stalking you through each level
- Jump to the beat of the off-road motorcycle and do acrobatics to dodge
- The game also offers some modern combat vehicles to add more fun when you visit this dirt bike unchained dinosaur park!
- Remember not to rush into the cute Dodo birds
- All you need to do is press the button to perform the eye-catching actions!

What are you waiting for? Enjoy the great excitement of riding a big displacement motorcycle with impressive camera angles like a Hollywood movie!
developers: Thai Hoa Technology and Media Solution Joint Stock Company
publishers: THAI HOA TECHNOLOGY AND MEDIA SOLUTION JOINT STOCK COMPANY
